txt.en: Concealed within Barad Guldur is Durchest, accompanied by ten lesser guards. Each guard alone is a mighty foe, and they lend their strength and fealty to cruel Durchest. You have been challenged to defeat each of the ten foes before Durchest can be slain.
Defeat Durchest and all ten of his guards

Durchest and his ten guards loom within sinister Barad Guldur.\n\nYou must engage in battle with Durchest, defeat each of his ten guards, and finally muster your remaining strength to slay Durchest himself.
